descriptions.description: This is the POSIX (UNIX, Linux, MacOS, ...) port of the 7-zip archiver.
Das ist die POSIX-Portierung (UNIX, Linux, MacOS, ...) des 7-zip-Archivierers.

comments.comment:
Original 7-zip provides latest sources. Download from SF not from the homepage.
http://www.7-zip.org/download.html http://sourceforge.net/projects/sevenzip/files/7-Zip/ http://sourceforge.net/projects/sevenzip/files/7-Zip/9.22/7z922.tar.bz2/download
http://www.7-zip.org/sdk.html http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sevenzip/lzma922.tar.bz2 http://sourceforge.net/projects/sevenzip/files/LZMA%20SDK/ http://sourceforge.net/projects/sevenzip/files/LZMA%20SDK/lzma922.tar.bz2/download
